attributes.action: have a public enquiry for the 7/7 terrorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people are entitled to a full public enquiry into the apparent mishandling of investigation into the terrorists that were known to the security services, yet still managed to bomb London on 07/07/2005. No stone should be left unturned in the quest for the answers, and why these terrorists were not prevented from carrying out thier cowardly deeds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
